description.pt: Restaurante com pratos sem glúten. Habitualmente tem pão sem glúten produzido de forma artesanal.
description.en: Restaurant with gluten-free dishes. There is usually gluten-free bread produced by hand.
description.fr: Restaurant avec plats sans gluten. Il y a généralement du pain artisanal sans gluten fabriqué.
description.es: Restaurante con platos sin gluten. Suele existir pan sin gluten elaborado de forma artesanal.
